entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the person who asked about the funny old witch and the little wizard in navy robes. She is described as being in the kitchen with Ron, examining notes and maps.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the person who responded to Hermione's question about the funny old witch and the little wizard in navy robes. He mentioned that his dad said everyone from Magical Maintenance wears navy blue robes.

entities.name: magical maintenance
entities.description: Magical Maintenance is an organization that employs people who wear navy blue robes, according to Ron's dad.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as entering the kitchen while Hermione and Ron were examining notes and maps.

entities.name: the ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is an organization that Hermione and Ron are planning to infiltrate.

entities.name: the funny old witch
entities.description: The funny old witch is a person who wears navy robes, according to Hermione's question.

entities.name: the little wizard
entities.description: The little wizard is a person who wears navy robes, according to Hermione's question.

relationships.description: Hermione and Ron are having a conversation about the funny old witch and the little wizard in navy robes.
Ron's dad said that everyone from Magical Maintenance wears navy blue robes, implying that Ron is employed by or associated with Magical Maintenance.
